data.name: 0000 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi. Apparently when you're tired you should get some sugar intake.

data.name: 0001 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Once again... what are you talking about all of a sudden?

data.name: 0002 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi told me and gave me a piece of candy. Looks like he has them ready just in case.

data.name: 0003 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh...? I had no idea Koizumi carried that kind of thing.

data.name: 0004 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I've got it here.

data.name: 0005 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can have it if you want.

data.name: 0006 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm not exactly tired, nor do I want it.

data.name: 0007 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're only saying this so you can rest a little, right?

data.name: 0008 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Well, I'm tired.

data.name: 0009 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then you should eat the candy Koizumi gave you.

data.name: 0010 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: However, you should eat it while we walk.

data.name: 0011 (199.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nah, I'll pass for now.

data.name: 0012 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I just thought--Suzumiya, would you like to eat a piece of candy?

data.name: 0013 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Candy? Like a gobstopper or something?

data.name: 0014 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, Koizumi gave me one.

data.name: 0015 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Or more specifically, I got it from Kyon who got it from Koizumi.

data.name: 0016 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What the hell? Kyon's illegally reselling something he was given?

data.name: 0017 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't think illegal reselling is the right way to describe it…

data.name: 0018 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Candy, huh… Well, I'll pass for now.

data.name: 0019 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're gonna have to eat lunch after this anyway.

data.name: 0020 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Right…

data.name: 0021 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More importantly, Mikuru. We need to raise the pace and run!

data.name: 0022 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-we're gonna run...?

data.name: 0023 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, you can at least walk fast. Let's hurry!

data.name: 0024 (199.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okaaaay…

data.name: 0025 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Eat this.

data.name: 0026 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh, what? What's this all of a sudden? This is... candy?

data.name: 0027 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Replenishes sugar levels. Cerebral nerves and synapses consume a lot of energy.

data.name: 0028 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Eat it.

data.name: 0029 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you bring this with you, Yuki?

data.name: 0030 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It wasn't me.

data.name: 0031 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It was a possession of Itsuki Koizumi.

data.name: 0032 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh...? Koizumi did...? I wouldn't expect that from him.

data.name: 0033 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But I don't need it right now. You eat it, Yuki.

data.name: 0034 (199.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'm fine.

data.name: 0035 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Sure? Then I guess I'll take it. I'll have it later.

data.name: 0036 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More important right now--the music room!

data.name: 0038 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, aren't you somewhat fatigued --doing investigation after investigation?

data.name: 0039 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No, I'm not really tired.

data.name: 0040 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. I was thinking of handing you this if you perhaps were.

data.name: 0041 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's that? Candy?

data.name: 0042 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. Sugar is best for when fatigued... particularly from mental labor.

data.name: 0043 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Your neurons are actively working for each individual inference, after all.

data.name: 0044 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The sentiment is more than enough. My brain is particularly strong.

data.name: 0045 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: My apologies for underestimating you.

data.name: 0046 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Are you carrying those around all the time, Koizumi?

data.name: 0047 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Not always, but on the occasion.

data.name: 0048 (199.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm sure Kyon's sister would be delighted if you gave her one.

data.name: 0049 (199.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then I shall do just that.
